author: Bruce C.

review: Exactly as described. Very easy to set up. Streams wonderfully clear.  Haven't attempted Kodi yet, but I've heard that works really well from friends who have.  Sorry I can't go into much more depth but I haven't toyed around with it as much as I would like.I do wish that there was an actual "off" feature. Or at least, I haven't figured out if there is a way to turn it off.  Currently you just have to wait for it to put itself to sleep.Would be nice if it came with an HDMI cable, but it doesn't. Not a deal breaker.  I'm sure you read that in other reviews too :-).Another friend told me of a great use for the Fire TV - one in any bedroom that you don't want to put a cable box in. I think it's ridiculous that cable providers force you to rent a cable box for every TV, even if you just want basic channels.  If you want to have something simple in each room, you can get a Fire TV (or Fire TV stick) and then stream from there.  NetFlix, Prime movies, HBO Go, etc.  Especially good idea if you get Kodi installed :-).Enjoy!
